bobby.engine.bobengine

Class GraphicsHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • bobby.engine.bobengine.GraphicsHelper

  • public class GraphicsHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class helps load graphics. Every BobView has it's own GraphicsHelper. Use getGraphicsHelper() in a BobView to get it's GraphicsHelper.
    Author:
    Ben

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GraphicsHelper(Context context)

      Load all of the added textures into openGL.
      boolean newGraphics()
      Returns true if new graphics have been added but have not been loaded.
      void setParameters(boolean useMipMaps, int minFilter, int magFilter)

    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphicsHelper

        public GraphicsHelper(Context context)

    • Method Detail

      • setParameters

        public void setParameters(boolean useMipMaps,
                          int minFilter,
                          int magFilter)
        Specify the texture parameters for all graphics loaded after this method is called.

        For 'retro' pixellated graphics, use (false, GL11.GL_NEAREST, GL11.GL_NEAREST)
        Parameters:
        useMipMaps - - true = better performance. Is already true by default.
        minFilter - - Filter to use for downscaling. Must be one of the OpenGL filters (eg. GL11.GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR (default))
        magFilter - - Filter for upscaling. Must be an OpenGL filter (eg. GL11.GL_LINEAR (default))

      • addGraphic

        public Graphic addGraphic(int drawable)
        Add a texture to the list of usuable textures.
        Parameters:
        drawable - - Drawable resource in R.drawable.*
        Returns:
        A Graphic object containing information about the newly created graphic. Store this somewhere where it can be accessed by GameObjects (Like as a static property in a BobView).

      • loadAllTextures

        public void loadAllTextures(GL11 gl)
        Load all of the added textures into openGL.
        Parameters:
        gl -

      • getNumGraphics

        public int getNumGraphics()
        Returns the number of loaded graphics.

      • newGraphics

        public boolean newGraphics()
        Returns true if new graphics have been added but have not been loaded.
